mapper.select: SELECT a.n_dzzl nDzzl, b.c_username cUsername, b.c_loginname cLoginname, a.c_userid cUserid FROM t_green_gold_dzhz a, plate_user b WHERE a.c_userid = b.c_userid ORDER BY a.n_dzzl DESC ,a.d_xgsj LIMIT 0,10

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS 'rank' FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM t_green_gold_dzhz ORDER BY n_dzzl DESC ,d_xgsj ) AS t ) AS b WHERE b.c_userid = #{cUserid} and b.c_zt='1';
SELECT t.*, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) rownum FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM t_green_gold_dzhz WHERE c_zt = '1' AND n_dzzl > 0 ORDER BY n_dzzl DESC, d_xgsj ) AS t
